description: This source file implements VLAN management and port mapping functions for a network service, including configuration, creation, deletion, and mapping of network interfaces, VLANs, and trunk ports. It interacts with hardware abstraction layers (HALs) and platform-specific components to perform low-level network configurations.

methods.name: int map(PL2Net net,PMemberControl members,BOOL mark)
methods.description: Maps network interfaces to platform-specific ports, updating the interface's dynamic status and event string, and marking members as handled if specified.

methods.name: int swfab_configVlan_inner(PPortConfigControl portConfig,PL2Net net,BOOL add)
methods.description: Configures VLAN on a platform port via hardware abstraction layer if not already handled.

methods.name: int swfab_configVlan(PL2Net net,PMemberControl members,BOOL add)
methods.description: Configures VLANs for network members, handling port mappings, trunk ports, and dep model interactions, supporting both multi- and single-HAL strategies.

methods.name: void printPlatport(PPlatformPort port)
methods.description: Prints the string identifier of a platform port for debugging purposes.

methods.name: int fillArgs(PHALArgMemberMap args,PMember members,int * handledArray,int numMembers)
methods.description: Fills argument structures for hardware abstraction layer calls based on matching HALs and interface mappings.

methods.name: int swfab_addVlan(PL2Net net,PMemberControl members)
methods.description: Public API to add a VLAN to a network.

methods.name: int swfab_removeVlan(PL2Net net,PMemberControl members)
methods.description: Public API to remove a VLAN from a network.

methods.name: int swfab_create(PL2Net net,PMemberControl members)
methods.description: Creates a new VLAN or network port configuration, initializing interfaces and handling HAL interactions.

methods.name: int swfab_domap(PL2Net net,PMemberControl members)
methods.description: Maps network interfaces to platform ports for a given network.

ctags.name: fillArgs
ctags.pattern: /^static int fillArgs(PHALArgMemberMap args, PMember members, int* handledArray, int numMembers) {$/

ctags.name: map
ctags.pattern: /^static int map(PL2Net net, PMemberControl members, BOOL mark) {$/

ctags.name: swfab_configVlan
ctags.pattern: /^static int swfab_configVlan(PL2Net net, PMemberControl members, BOOL add) {$/

ctags.name: swfab_configVlan_inner
ctags.pattern: /^static int swfab_configVlan_inner(PPortConfigControl portConfig, PL2Net net, BOOL add) {$/
